Uses of Interface
io.netty.channel.FileRegion

  • Packages that use FileRegion 
    Package Description
    io.netty.channel
    The core channel API which is asynchronous and event-driven abstraction of various transports such as a NIO Channel.
    io.netty.channel.group
    A channel registry which helps a user maintain the list of open Channels and perform bulk operations on them.
    io.netty.channel.nio
    NIO-based channel API implementation - recommended for a large number of connections (>= 1000).
    io.netty.channel.oio
    Old blocking I/O based channel API implementation - recommended for a small number of connections (< 1000).
    io.netty.channel.socket.aio
    NIO2-based socket channel API implementation - recommended for a large number of connections (>= 1000).
    io.netty.handler.timeout
    Adds support for read and write timeout and idle connection notification using a Timer.

    • Uses of FileRegion in io.netty.channel

      Classes in io.netty.channel that implement FileRegion 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultFileRegion
      Default FileRegion implementation which transfer data from a FileChannel.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static void AbstractChannel.checkEOF(FileRegion region, long writtenBytes) 
      protected void AbstractChannel.doFlushFileRegion(FileRegion region, ChannelPromise promise)
      Flush the content of the given FileRegion to the remote peer.
      void CombinedChannelDuplexHandler.sendFile(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, FileRegion region, ChannelPromise promise) 
      void ChannelOperationHandlerAdapter.sendFile(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, FileRegion region, ChannelPromise promise)
      Calls ChannelOutboundInvoker.sendFile(FileRegion, ChannelPromise) to forward to the next ChannelOperationHandler in the ChannelPipeline.
      void ChannelOperationHandler.sendFile(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, FileRegion region, ChannelPromise promise)
      Called once a sendFile operation is made and so the FileRegion should be transfered.
      void ChannelDuplexHandler.sendFile(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, FileRegion region, ChannelPromise future)
      Calls ChannelOutboundInvoker.sendFile(FileRegion, ChannelPromise) to forward to the next ChannelOperationHandler in the ChannelPipeline.
      ChannelFuture AbstractChannel.sendFile(FileRegion region) 
      void Channel.Unsafe.sendFile(FileRegion region, ChannelPromise promise)
      Send a FileRegion to the remote peer and notify the ChannelPromise once it completes or an error was detected.
      ChannelFuture AbstractChannel.sendFile(FileRegion region, ChannelPromise promise) 
      void AbstractChannel.AbstractUnsafe.sendFile(FileRegion region, ChannelPromise promise)
